# applicationData

**Instance Property**

Optional merchant-supplied information about the disbursement request.

## Declaration

```swift
var applicationData: Data? { get set }
```

## Discussion

The system hashes the data and includes it in the resulting [doc://com.apple.passkit/documentation/PassKit/PKPaymentToken].
title: applicationData
